code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./App.css";import Axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[sname,setStudentName]=useState("");const[tech,setTechnology]=useState("");const[status,setStatus]=useState("");const submitReview=()=>{Axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:9000/aliens',{name:sname,tech:tech,sub:status}).then(()=>{alert("success");});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"CRUD Application Demo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"information",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Student Name"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"sname",onChange:e=>{setStudentName(e.target.value);},required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Technology"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"tech",onChange:e=>{setTechnology(e.target.value);},required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Status"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"status",onChange:e=>{setStatus(e.target.value);},required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:submitReview,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Submit"})})]})]});}export default App;
